main.intro_text:
HashGen UI is a tool for generating cryptographic hash values for files.
Step 1) Select a file using the Browse button
Step 2) Choose your preferred hash algorithm (SHA256, SHA384, or SHA512)
Step 3) Click Generate Hash to create the hash value.
You can process individual files or use a filelist.txt for batch processing.

output.title: Hash Output
output.intro_text: The hash value has been successfully generated:

info.title: Information
info.hash_saved:
The hash value has been successfully generated
and saved to the output file.
info.filelist_complete:
Processing of the file list has been completed.
All hash values have been saved to hash-filelist.json.
info.copied_clipboard: The hash value has been successfully copied to the clipboard.

warning.title: Warning
warning.no_file_selected:
Please select a file
before generating a hash value.
warning.file_not_found: The specified file could not be found.
warning.hash_generation_failed: Failed to generate hash value for the file.

error.title: Error
error.invalid_file: The selected file is invalid or cannot be accessed.
error.hash_failed: An error occurred while generating the hash value.
error.output_write_failed: Failed to write the hash value to the output file.
error.file_not_found: The specified file could not be found.
